description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the LDAP denial of service vulnerability (CVE-2024-21356):

1. Download and apply the respective update package based on your Windows version from the official Microsoft Update catalog.
2. Restart your system after the installation to ensure all changes take effect.

**Details**:
- Relevant KB Articles: 
  - For Windows 11 Version 23H2, use KB5034765.
  - For Windows 10 Version 22H2, use KB5034763.
- Update package links:
  - Windows 11: [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034766)
  - Windows 10: [KB5034774](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034774)
- Ensure your system version matches the established build numbers provided, ranging from versions 21H2 to 23H2.

**Preconditions**:
- Make sure to backup your critical data before proceeding with the update installation. The updates are crucial for protecting against denial of service attacks via the LDAP protocol.
